Comments_List: I learned a lot about the US Air Force and what it means to be an airman.
I learned about the Air Force, different jobs in the Air Force, and the purpose of the Air Force. Moreover, we learned about topics ranging from leadership traits to types of strategies.
I learned about the Air Force and its history.
I learned the basic doctrine, strategy, and elements of the Air Force.
Tenets and doctrine of air power/warfare, information about different organizations on base, different fields in the AF, how to give better briefings.
It couldve been more organized, with possibly a better amount of review in preparation for the final. However, the class was interesting and informative.
The course was very interesting and informative. I will be able to use the information I learned in this class when I am an Air Force officer.
The material was very easy to follow and it was taught well.
The course was great. The lectures were engaging and the assignments were fun and low-stress, while still teaching us the required information.
For other AS100 cadets, I definitely think it is important.
I would recommend this course to another student because it was very interesting and well-taught.
I would recommend this course to anyone interested in ROTC.
